instruction: A text is given in English. Translate it from the English language to the Marathi language. The translation must not omit or add information to the original sentence.
input: Not only this, this work has grown by several folds in the last 15 years.

instruction: A text is given in English. Translate it from the English language to the Marathi language. The translation must not omit or add information to the original sentence.
input: In the 21st century some people are propagating violence in the world just to place one's beliefs as superior to the others'.
output: सरदार साहेबानी आपल्याला जो देश दिला आहे त्याची एकता आणि अखंडता कायम राखणे हे सव्वाशे कोटी देशवासियांचे उत्तरदायित्व आहे, सव्वाशे कोटी देशवासियांची जबाबदारी आहे.

instruction: A text is given in English. Translate it from the English language to the Marathi language. The translation must not omit or add information to the original sentence.
input: That world has taught me to work, to take decisions and to implement them by understanding the requirement of the country, of the poor people.
output: त्या दुनियेनेच मला शिकवलं की, देशाची आवश्यकता लक्षात घेवून, गरीबांच्या गरजांचा विचार करून कार्य केले पाहिजे.

instruction: A text is given in English. Translate it from the English language to the Marathi language. The translation must not omit or add information to the original sentence.
input: Friends, if we had not improved things at the grass root level then it would have never been possible to see the kind of growth and speed that you see.
output: साथींनो, जर आम्ही अगदी तळाशी जावून, सगळी परिस्थिती, सगळ्या गोष्टी व्यवस्थित केल्या नसत्या तर आज आपण ही जी प्रगती पाहत आहात, विकासाचा वेग पाहत आहात, ते केवळ अशक्य होते.

instruction: A text is given in English. Translate it from the English language to the Marathi language. The translation must not omit or add information to the original sentence.
input: He added that the government has begun fulfilling the promises made to the nation.
output: कायद्यानुसार दोषींना आवश्यक ती शिक्षा झाली पाहिजे, असे ते म्हणाले.

instruction: A text is given in English. Translate it from the English language to the Marathi language. The translation must not omit or add information to the original sentence.
input: I am a partner in the zeal of our brave soldiers who are ready to make supreme sacrifice for our safety in the places like Kargil and Siachin where there is bone-biting cold and the places like Jaisalmer and Kutch where the heat singes the skin.
output: मी भागीदार आहे आपल्या त्या शूर जवानांच्या शौर्याचा जे सियाचीन आणि कारगिलच्या हाडे गोठवणाऱ्या थंडीपासून जैसलमेर आणि कच्छच्या कातडी होरपळवणाऱ्या तापत्या वाळवंटात आपल्या सुरक्षेसाठी आपले सर्वकाही बलिदान करायला तयार असतात.

instruction: A text is given in English. Translate it from the English language to the Marathi language. The translation must not omit or add information to the original sentence.
input: We experience this thing in our family life, we know that the birthday of our kid will fall in the month of May so planning starts from February-March that what we should day on the birthday.
output: आपण कौटुंबिक जीवनात देखील पाहतो कि मी महिन्यात मुलाचा वाढदिवस असेल तर फेब्रुवारी-मार्च पासूनच , अच्छा, वाढदिवसाला कायकरायचे?

input: This is an add-on to your normal meals so that your 14-18 year old daughters develop well physically.

instruction: A text is given in English. Translate it from the English language to the Marathi language. The translation must not omit or add information to the original sentence.
input: For this purpose, we have repeatedly refined our FDI Policy in construction sector
output: म्हणून बांधकाम क्षेत्रात विदेशी गुंतवणुकीला प्रोत्साहन देण्यासाठी, बांधकाम क्षेत्रात विदेशी गुंतवणुक नीतीमध्ये आम्ही वारंवार सुधारणा केल्या आहेत.
